fullName.jp: スコール・レオンハート

description.jp: バラムガーデンで傭兵としての訓練に励む 特殊部隊ＳｅｅＤ候補生。他人との接触を拒む孤独な人物だったが レジスタンスの少女リノアと出会い 心を通わせる過程で 次第に殻を破っていく。遂には愛する人や世界を守るため 邪悪な「魔女」との戦いに挑んだ。
description.gl: A SeeD cadet training to be a mercenary at Balamb Garden. He was a lone wolf, who shunned away others, until his encounter with Rinoa helped him gradually open up and ultimately embark on a journey to defeat the evil sorceress.

jp.text: ……悪いな\nそういう話なら パスだ
あんたのおかげで\nどんな卑怯な相手にも\n負ける気がしない
自分のことは自分でどうにか\nするしかないだろ？
俺たちと 一緒にいてくれ
ふざけるな\nこいつは渡さない！
まだ間に合う\n……だから来た
騎士ごっこを続ける気か？

gl.text: That's something I'd rather not talk about.
Thanks to you、 I feel like I can take on anyone. Even if they fight dirty、 like you.
Everyone has to take care of themselves.
No! I'll never hand over Rinoa!
Are you going to continue with this knight thing?

name.jp: ソリッドバレルエクステンド

desc.gl:
Solid Barrel use +4

When using Solid Barrel:
 • 4-hit melee BRV attack becomes 3-hit melee BRV attack + group melee BRV attack + single-target HP attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • INT BRV Up becomes Solitary Lion with slight MAX BRV, ATK boost

While Solitary Lion active:
 • Solid Barrel becomes Solid Barrel+

When using Solid Barrel+:
 • 5-hit melee BRV attack becomes the following:
 • 4-hit melee BRV attack + single-target HP attack
 • Increases own BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt
 • Group melee BRV attack + single-target HP attack
 • Tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Deals 50% of cumulative HP damage to non-targets
 • INT BRV Up becomes Solitary Lion with slight MAX BRV, ATK boost

While Solitary Lion active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+:
 • 3-hit melee BRV attack + group melee BRV attack; largely increased cumulative BRV damage

desc.gl:
When using Rough Divide:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Adds effect to special effect Roaring Hammer that slightly increases HP damage dealt (does not increase with level)

At start of quest:
 • Self: 8 turns 1 level of special effect Roaring Hammer (limit 3)

Triggers following attack after HP attack while special effect Roaring Hammer active (some attacks excluded; once per turn):
 • 5-hit group melee BRV attack + single-target HP attack
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

クエスト開始時
自身に8ACTION特殊効果「咆える撃鉄」1段階付与（上限3）

　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・使用後 「ソリッドバレル」「連続剣」の使用回数＋1（上限あり）

自身の与えるBRVダメージとHPダメージ小アップの効果追加
（段階によって効果は上昇しない）

・4HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋単体HP攻撃を2回行う
・攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ

　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
